name: Some Arcade Game
description:
Controls:

W - Move Forward.

Mouse - Control.

Space - Energy Realese.

Instructions:

You need to avoid being hit by red enemies. Overtime you slowly gather energy and you can realese it to push away enemies. There are 2 power-up types. Speed PowerUp that makes you faster for 5 seconds and Energy PowerUp that restores your full energy.

Description:

My game for #153 Trijam made in 3 hours.

Trijam Page: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152/rate/1356355

Music Source: https://patrickdearteaga.com/arcade-music/

Bug: enemies and powerups are visible above energy bar (will be fixed later).
